name: tutorial

scripts.setup: npm i && cd react-chat-app && npm i
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run server" "cd react-chat-app && npm start"

description: To set up is very easy. Just run: ```bash npm run setup ``` After the installation is complete, then run: ```bash npm run dev ``` Till We Cross Path, I remain, Fredrick Emmanuel (divofred)😁😁❤❤
